name: The Last Nightmare (Zero_Motivation, Aniki_ta)
description:
Is there a way out of the vicious circle, or is the outcome a foregone conclusion? You have to find answers to your questions and unravel the mystery of the gloomy nightmare in which you find yourself. But time is short, because while you are trying to understand what happens from scraps of scattered notes, death is already breathing down your back ...

First attempt at creating a horror game! The game came out as a pretty generic horror with such elements as introducing plot via notes and other “paper things”, and spooky atmospheric locations. Anyways, the most exciting part is the game’s ending!

Update on Bugfixes!

Please, download the ''Bugfixes'' version of the game for the best experience.
